entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmpnkvxfciv/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0081.9277] The line item concept us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold with a value of 6,466,520 is represented as a child of us-gaap:OperatingExpenses with a value of 83,255,514 in the companies extension taxonomy role 00000004 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Income (Loss). The element us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold however, is not represented as a component of us-gaap:OperatingExpenses in the calculation relationships defined in the US GAAP taxonomy. The US-GAAP taxonomies include us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold as a sibling element (or child of that sibling) relative to us-gaap:OperatingExpenses in the calculation relationships of the US GAAP taxonomy. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:OperatingExpenses and the child element us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold.
The properties of this us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold fact are:
Period :2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 9.0.0RC4 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/752642/000149315219002992/umh-20181231.xml 9673

property.name: label
property.value: Cost of Sales of Manufactured Homes
